thread.title: America Will Add 1 Gigawatt of Solar Every Month Between Now and the End of 2016
thread.title_full: America Will Add 1 Gigawatt of Solar Every Month Between Now and the End of 2016

title: America Will Add 1 Gigawatt of Solar Every Month Between Now and the End of 2016
text:
10 America Will Add 1 Gigawatt of Solar Every Month Between Now and the End of 2016 
Greentech Media: The solar rush in America is on. With every company moving as quickly as possible to finish projects before federal tax credits get slashed at the end of 2016, U.S. installation figures aren't going anywhere but up -- at least for the next year and a half.
